summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5290 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 37, Yesler's 2nd Addition Supplemental, being the alley between 28th Avenue North and 29th Avenue North, from East John Street to East Thomas Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 61149, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
